[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [icons](./blockly.icons_namespace.md) &gt; [MutatorIcon](./blockly.icons_namespace.mutatoricon_class.md)

## icons.MutatorIcon class

An icon that allows the user to change the shape of the block.

For example, it could be used to add additional fields or inputs to the block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MutatorIcon extends Icon implements IHasBubble 
```
**Extends:** [Icon](./blockly.icons_namespace.icon_class.md)

**Implements:** [IHasBubble](./blockly.ihasbubble_interface.md)
